feed.title: Lab Dash Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's changed

  • allow spaces in page names
  • fix a timeout issue for pihole inside dual widget

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.2.1
entry.content:
What's changed

  • allow spaces in page names
  • add Sonarr queue management widget
  • add Radarr queue management widget
  • add SABnzbd support
  • add Media Request Management widget (jellyserr/overseer requests)
  • add Media Server widget showing current sessions (Jellyfin only, Plex support coming soon)
  • add Adguard home widget
  • add Disk Monitor widget
  • add internet connectivity indicator in status bar (test ISP connection)
  • add more options for System Info widget (toggle info button, toggle disk usage bar, added internet connectivity options)
  • rename Torrent Client to Download Client (torrent+usenet support with SABnzbd)
  • bug fixes and security improvements

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.2.2
entry.content:
What's changed

  • fix an issue with group layouts
  • fix an issue with groups removing items when editing group layout

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.2.3
entry.content:
What's changed

  • add notes widget
  • fix media request manager widget not asking for seasons of tv shows
  • various bug fixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for Lab Dash: v1.2.4
entry.content:
What's changed

  • redirect to home page after entering edit mode from settings
